BA and Sb heard perseus 's call adn replied " who is this"

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:One of the quiet figures on the other side of the room started hitting
something metal... he repeately hit it until it a part of it fell off
on the floor.  Then there was a sound of a door opening and hurried
footsteps.  Perseus followed and discovered that they had found a way
out; however the hall was still dark.

He followed the others until they found a shaft of light coming in. 
Everyone gathered in front of it.  Upon close examination, that light
was coming from a crack in another door.  While they worked on the
door, Perseus continued trying to call out with his radio.

On 7/11/05, Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
> Pod:
>  
> It was the signal of a pod in a Maximal frecuency. The signal came some
> where around the place where  the Pacificus were
> ----- Original Message ----- 
> From: rm2kmidi 
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Sent: Monday, July 11, 2005 12:31 PM
> Subject: Re: Pasificus Maximals
> 
> Peseus had completed searching the room.  They found that it was
> almost a perfect square metal room, with some sort of a metal door at
> one end which was almost as wide as that whole side of the room.  He
> was just about to call another "meeting" when a signal came over the
> radio.
> 
> "Well, at least I know my radio still works." he said to himself as he
> tried to get to where the signal was strongest, "Hello, is somebody
> there?"
> 
> The others seemed to notice that he was talking to himself, but remained
> quiet.
> 
> On 7/8/05, Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
> > ????:
> >  
> > A slight signal started to appear in Pacificus's chanel
> > 
> > ----- Original Message ----- 
> > From: rm2kmidi 
> > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> > Sent: Friday, July 08, 2005 7:30 PM
> > Subject: Pasificus Maximals
> > 
> > NPCS:
> > 
> > There is darkness.  Small lights flicker in the distance, some tired
> > groaning and shuffling of feet.  Lord Perseus stands to his feet, and
> > thinks of something to say.
> > 
> > "Who's out there?  Is everyone allright?"
> > 
> > The flickering lights move closer.  They dont' say a word.
> > 
> > "Friend or Foe?"
> > 
> > He is now surrounded by at least 3 pairs of lights.
> > 
> > "Who is that?" asked a voice in the darkness.
> > 
> > "I mean you no harm, I just awoke here and I have no idea what is going
> on."
> > 
> > "I think we all just woke up not 20 minutes ago.  We were trying to
> > find a way out of this room, or cave.   We're not certain where we
> > are.  Perhaps you can help us."
> > 
> > "I guess that's would be the prudent thing to do; first let me know
> > your names?  I'm Perseus"
> > 
> > "...."
> > 
> > "Or not..... I guess you're not up for a converstation.  Ok, lets
> > search every wall and try to find what kind of room this is.  OK?"
> > 
> > There was a grunt in agreement, then everyone spread out.
> >
